transcript:
rose a high white ruffle, outlining his rather long face which was lit up from below. 
"For what have you come hither?" asked the newcomer, turning in Pierre's direction at a slight rustle made by the latter. "Why have you, who do not believe in the truth of the light and who have not seen the light, come here? What do you seek from us? Wisdom, virtue, en- lightenment?" 
At the moment the door opened and the stranger came in, Pierre felt a sense of awe and veneration such as he had
